snippet: Lawyers for Bradley Ballard, a prisoner who had schizophrenia and diabetes, say he was ignored for seven days while confined in a cell.
abstract: Family of Bradley Ballard, who died at Rikers Island in mental health observation unit, sues city of New York, correction officials, contractor that provides medical services in jails and three doctors and other personnel; lawyers say Ballard, who had schizophrenia and diabetes, was ignored for week while confined in cell.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and MICHAEL WINERIP
